lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I feel people in other countries who are less priveleged than, say, entrepeneurs in Canada, should be able to have opportunities to manage a company. It is a blessing to know that I am helping these people.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to entrepeneurs who need help starting/managing/running their company or business.

lender.name: Liverpool Rummies
lender.loan_because: we want to do something constructive in the world.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a school nurse, who atkes care for 500 children's health issues a day.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving others a chance.

lender.name: Anderson Family
lender.loan_because: God has richly blessed us more than we deserve. It is a joy to be able to help others and impact their livelihoods and futures.
lender.occupational_info: My husband helps people by answering their questions about their insurance benefits for Aetna/Medicare. I work part-time cleaning houses and volunteer in my son's classroom as often as I can. I am hoping to go back to school to become a nurse.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I understand the incredible power of free market capitalism to help people build wealth to change their lives in positive ways. Access to loans allows the system to work for people who lack the present ability to repay at high interest rates.
lender.occupational_info: I sell pharmaceutical manufacturing machines and equipment such as tablet presses, homoginizers and blister packaging machines .

lender.name: John & Sherrie
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: Sherrie helps people invest money so they can have a more secure future. John provides safe and comfortable rental housing.

lender.name: Enilda
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel great!
lender.occupational_info: I help develop new medicines for infectious diseases.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping hard working people grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate and construction lawyer

lender.name: ENGLISH
lender.occupation: to become at one w/ the elements of nature.
lender.loan_because: We are lucky, spoiled Americans. I realize how lucky I am compared to the average human on this planet and want to help others who aren't as fortunate.

lender.name: Jennifer & Brett
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a community for the elderly at the Front Desk. I assist them with everything from unlocking their door to spending time just chatting. My husband is a mechanic for a commerical ailrine.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I am considering Kiva at this time.
lender.occupational_info: Something I take great pride in doing. But life should not be all about work. The more you live the more you learn.The more people we experience the more we understand the value of each life.

lender.name: hilton
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: jk froghouse
lender.loan_because: by transforming our environment, we transform the world...
lender.occupational_info: What i am up to is creating projects, enrolling others and releasing projects to others for completion as their own... providing value for the good of all

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: it's important to help others who want to help themselves, but don't have the means to do so.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Life is not a dress rehearsal !
lender.occupational_info: Retired and loving it!

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I recognize hard-working people still need basic resources to be productive and believe that they should have access to this basic opportunity.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: A little amount can go a long way- and us college students only have a little sometimes
lender.occupational_info: Learning

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I loan because i want to help and make a difference in the world, to pay it forward, little by little. Big changes come about from little steps.
lender.occupational_info: I train people how to train their dogs with a specialty in puppy's

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of microloans in parts of the world that lesser have opportunities for people to obtain traditional debt financing from banks or other entities that require substantial collateralization. This is true 'venture capitalism' at the grassroots level.

lender.name: Mata6
lender.loan_because: I love knowing that I have helped someones dream become a reality. I just love helping people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a full time student getting my degree in International business Marketing and IB. Beside school I also have a full time job at a Hyatt Hotel.

lender.name: Stanimal
lender.loan_because: I want to be a catalyst for positive change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make upset customers happy again.

lender.name: Dale Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help and I am excited that you have provided an opportunity to give for those of us who don't have unlimited funds at our disposal. Thank you!
lender.occupational_info: I do healing work with energy, massage, and listening.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to stay home with my kids and participate in volunteer work with The Ronald McDonald House and Cathedral Kitchen, both in Camden, NJ. I know how fortunate I am and I firmly believe in sharing with those who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Layne & Lori
lender.loan_because: We are inspired by the entrepreneurial spirit of the business owners and wish them success in their desire to provide a better life for their families.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I drive to optical businesses and sell them eyewear to display and sell at their offices.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: To make a significant impact in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am researching the biochemistry of cardio vascular diseases.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: the people who seek out loans such as Kiva's are trying to improve their lot so I'm happy to help them.
lender.occupational_info: Boring

lender.name: Cathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people have a better life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Giving to other people gives me the blessings of both realizing how much I have even though I struggle myself as a single mother AND the wonderful feeling of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to young adults in college.

lender.name: Barbara & Robert
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world. Give a man a fish: he eats for a day. TEACH a man to fish: he eats for a lifetime
lender.occupational_info: Owner of a construction company. We renovate Homes

lender.name: Damon & Alice
lender.loan_because: To redistribute wealth for the good of the world.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I spent 8 years working for a bank. Now I want to try doing banking one-on-one, to see if it feels even more rewarding to help someone who needs a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am an idea person. I like to put ideas into action. I'm no longer with the bank, my previous employer. I want to set up a business of my own, so I'm very interested in what people around the world are doing with their small businesses.

lender.name: Sonny & Maureen
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do ,nobody succeeds without help of somekind and what better way to give people a little help "Its not what we're owed it's what we owe"

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I like empowering active persons
lender.occupational_info: Use nasty chemicals to make RO Water

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: For so long I felt that we could no longer make a difference in the world. Kiva allows me to help people do what they dream of doing and support their families to the best of their abilities. I only hope that this little thing makes big things happen.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I appreciate all the breaks I've been given, and this is a way I can return the favor and multiply it. Ask and You Shall Receive, believe that you have it and it shall be yours. Thanks for asking!

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I am very much aware of how lucky I am to have been born in a part of the world with lots of opportunities and wealth. Personally, I don't have a lot of money, but it's not very hard to lend some of what I do have!
lender.occupational_info: I am working on an advanced college degree (PhD) in English literature. In particular, I work with poems and plays from England that are about 400 years old. I teach college students about these stories, poems, and plays and I also teach writing.

lender.name: Claudette
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have lived and worked in developing countries for many years. Kiva is a great example of how individuals around the globe can work together to promote community development and social improvements.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sociology professor at a local university and teach classes on global social change, organizational development, and environmental management. I have also conducted research on collaborative management of natural resources.

lender.name: Alicia(1996-2009)
lender.loan_because: To make people happy and fulfill their goals.

lender.name: Marielle
lender.loan_because: It is empowers people to turn their dreams into reality

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that 1 person can make a difference. I want to see change in this world, and proud that I can be apart of the change.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student that enjoys volunteering and being a mentor to hundreds of inner-city children. I also enjoy working with people with disabilities.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important for people to grow and prosper, so their communities can grow and prosper, and then we can all grow and prosper. :)
lender.occupational_info: I design advertising fliers for business. These fliers go in the news paper.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I am priveledged to have an education and good job. People should give others a chance too.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for the National Park Service and am now retired.

lender.name: Zinnia and Laury
lender.loan_because: My granddaughter and I want to share with others, and help make the world how we think it should be. We are happy to have the opportunity to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I, Laury, am a woodcarver. I create animal characters out of wood and then sell them. Zinnia has just turned one, so her work is mostly learning to walk and putting things in her mouth.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I was gifted $25 for Christmas from my son and his wife, who do a lot of volunteering for organizations that help children. They knew this would appeal to me.
lender.occupational_info: I get to come to the home of people I love and take care of their two children while they go to work as ER doctors in local hospitals. My hours are crazy, but the family is wonderful and I love the children as if they were my own.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: Lives change even with the smallest mustard seed of hope.
lender.occupational_info: My work can be challenging yet fulfilling, demanding yet giving, terrifying yet comforting. No matter what line of we are in, it can be all these things.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to be living in the best country in the world (Canada) and have so much. I need to help others to reach their potential.
lender.occupational_info: Retired military, now working in sales.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I believe that people are better than banks.
lender.occupational_info: I buy skincare and haircare products for a cosmetics retailer with over 200 stores in the United States.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: For the price of a few soy lattes, I can help someone start up or expand a business. Plus, the high from lending feels better than the caffeine rush!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We are all one world family. We must strive to take care of one another.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students at a university in California. These students are working toward theirdoctorates in organizational leadership. I hope toi help them in becoming humane and caring leaders of our world family.

lender.name: Allan
lender.occupation: Retired Mathematician/ Retreaded as Stone Sculptor

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: Owing your own business is a great experience and is a means towards long term prosperity and independence. Whatever we can do to facilitate that experience is a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a business and real estate lawyer, focusing on transactions, working with startup companies and helping community development organizations create and finance affordable housing.

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: 1. multi-national banks are the economic incarnation of Stalin. 2. unlike voting, it makes a difference.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to directly help someone so far away.
lender.occupational_info: Watercolor landscape painter

lender.name: JEANNE & MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate for Xmas, but will continue to loan because I am lucky enough to have a little extra.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school math and Michael teaches the English language to students new to America.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.occupation: social worker, journalist, tutor, and dog walker

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-loans as one of the best ways to help women (and men) create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: When I worked I ran a Women's Center that helped women go to college. Now I am raising 3 young boys to hopefully grow into wonderful men.

lender.name: Carol-Ann
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to be treated equally and with respect

lender.name: Flint and Ursula
lender.loan_because: This is a great way of helping those who are trying so hard to help themselves! Each of us have been blessed with the ability to share something with those about us!

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: One person CAN make a difference.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur, and I want to give back and help others. I know how much it means to have someone believe in you and offer help!

lender.name: Johanna
lender.occupational_info: I am in my last year of college, and I also take care of kids and teach piano.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Heidi & Tony
lender.loan_because: We care

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: these are my sisters and brothers and I want to help them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I love to pay back for all the blessings I have received. My home land is New Zealand.

lender.name: Michael J R*
lender.loan_because: We are all slaves to the Bilderberger econonic system and agenda. Paper currency rules the modern world and I may as well do my part to contribute to the spread of the "system". LONG LIVE the Trilateral Commission!!!

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I am assured that my money goes entirely and directly to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed commercial painter.

lender.name: Elle Dornan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who have the will and drive to succeed.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to work and have their own business as I have. Success can be just a small loan away.
lender.occupational_info: Designing, estimating, and building or remodeling homes. I am "Adding Atmosphere to Space".

lender.name: Dawn & Curt
lender.loan_because: We know how hard it is to own your own business and being able to help other small business owners in other parts of the world is exciting and joyful and purposeful!
lender.occupational_info: Curt designs and oversees the building of homes and business and Dawn works for a warehouse logistical software company.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for those who have helped me. To be able to be involved in something extraordinary like Kiva is important.
lender.occupational_info: Due to the present economy in the United States I am unemployed. However, essentially what I enjoy doing in my work is anything that my skill sets can provide a service for someone else.

lender.name: Zackey Family
lender.loan_because: We want to do what we can, and teach our son the value of giving to others.

lender.name: Andrew and Teresa
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We run a theatre company that does shows about things that need to be changed.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help people help them selves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I pamper my clients and make them feel great with massages, manicures & pedicures. People from all over the world stay at my Bed & Breakfast.

lender.name: Humby
lender.loan_because: Helping others achieve their dreams is why we are alive.

lender.name: Dorte
lender.loan_because: I like to see things grow ...

lender.name: Downs Family
lender.loan_because: We are a family of educators and envoirnmental stewards. We have been lucky in life and love and want to contribute to those who are ready to work to succeed.

lender.name: Brittani
lender.loan_because: I would want somebody to loan to me if I really needed it
lender.occupational_info: I distribute clothing to stores across the country.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I believe that a "hand-up" has more of a lasting impact than a "hand-out".

lender.name: Mike and Shayne
lender.loan_because: You reap what you sow...

lender.name: Pierre A.
lender.loan_because: I lend money to this organization because it makes genuine dreams come true in a well supervised environment. It also brings back memories of similar efforts we undertook ln service in Rwanda and Burundi.

lender.name: Ellen and Felix
lender.loan_because: IWe want to enable women to be independent.
lender.occupational_info: We build and sell new homes.

lender.name: Ball
lender.loan_because: Equal access to financial assistance fosters the healthiest economies

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: Give, and it will be given to you. I believe in helping others, especially those working to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Computers and satellites.

lender.name: Jay Reb
lender.loan_because: I watched about this web site in PBS, and it has really made an impact on me. Helping others to follow their dreams is something I have always wanted to get involved in. So, I think this will be a great for me to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Just a full time student.

lender.name: Monet E.
lender.loan_because: I know that sometimes all a person needs is a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Selling meats and cheeses at a local market.

lender.name: Jay and Jenn
lender.loan_because: we believe that people should help take care and support one another. We are blessed to have what we have and we want to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: Jay works buying and shipping for the Marine industry and Jenn works with special events and also has background as a youth counsellor with children and teens.

lender.name: Ian
lender.occupational_info: Internet applications

lender.name: Fabiola
lender.loan_because: I am peruvian and I know that peruvian people with a little support can make their business grow and make a difference.

lender.name: Daron
lender.loan_because: I find the opportunity to help others who work work and are able to help themselves given the opportunity is and incredibly unique charitable opportunity. I particularly like loaning to those who have children to support as I believe there isn't a better cause than to give families and children the best opportunities in life possible.
lender.occupational_info: I manage information technology workers and complex projects for all types of industries.

lender.name: Heather & Craig
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy to share the good fortune we've had with more people in an empowering way.

lender.name: Craig and Michelle
lender.loan_because: All people are made in the image of God and deserve a chance to succeed and be fruitful.

lender.name: stenersensgartneri
lender.loan_because: nobody can get somebody started.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: I believe if people have something to lose, they will not go to war as easily. So why not help them build something?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a translator, but when business is bad (= most of the time), I trade in stocks.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I want direct access to the people I aim to help. I wish that help to go to those who want to help themselves but lack the funds.
lender.occupational_info: Detailed analysis of retail figures based on buying experience in retail with companies usch as Lidl and Wal-Mart.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to try and help in what small way I can to make a difference in others lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in travel for a retail company

lender.name: Jyri
lender.loan_because: Party donations!
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Viviane
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lender.name: Norbert
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense to me, and it moves my heart at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer of medical articles for specialized doctors' journals.

lender.name: ben
lender.loan_because: i do give loan at interest rate, any body who is intrested should contact me via mail bencosmos_loanfirm@yahoo.com
lender.occupational_info:
HELLO, WE ARE HERE TO HELP THE COUNTRY AND THE WHOLE WORLD BY OFFERING LOANS TO THOSE WHO ARE IN NEED OF HELP WITH MONEY.WE HAVE BEEN REGISTERED BY THE GOVERNMENT TO PLS MAKE SURE THAT WE GIVE THIS LOANS AT A LOW RATE SO THAT OUR CLIENT CAN BE ABLE TO PAY. OUR COMPANY LEFT THIS LOAN AT 5% BUT WHEN WE WERE TOLD THAT THE GOVERNMENT HAS SAID WE SHOULD PLS BRING IT TO A LOWER RATE THEN WE NOW REDUCED IT TO 3%.SO WERE HERE TO TELL YOU THAT THIS YEAR WILL NOT EVER BE LIKE LAST YEAR. SO PLS TRY AND HELP YOUR SELF BY GETTING THIS LOAN OKEY,SO PLS IF INTERESTED YOU WILL HAVE TO FILL THE BORROWERS INFO GIVEN TO US BY THE GOVERNMENT.SO BE FAST WITH IT OKEY THANKS AND GREAT REGARDS:
BORROWERS INFORMATION YOUR NAME_____________________________ ADDRESS________________________________ AGE_____________________________________ STATE___________________________________ SEX_____________________________________ PHONE NUMBER__________________________ FAX_____________________________________ AMOUNT NEEDED_________________________ DURATION_______________________________ MONTHLY INCOME________________________ ZIP CODE________________________________ COUNTRY________________________________ COUNTRY CODE__________________________ Contact us now vial.. E- mail--<bencosmos_loanfirm@yahoo.com > I await your urgent reply. Processing Officer Mr Ben

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: The world is unfair. I have all the things I need.

lender.name: Marcos
lender.loan_because: I would like to use what God gave me to help other lives.

lender.name: Cornelia
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone fulfill thier dream. I have had help in my life and it is a great way to 'Pay it Forward'.

lender.name: Suwattana and Ross
lender.loan_because: Kiva helps average folks help average folks.
lender.occupational_info: Suwattana works p/t at a local supermarket, Ross works in construction management and supervision for utiliies.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Builder. Entrepreneur

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It's better than a donation and it goes straight to someone who will use it to improve their lot in life.

lender.name: Chris & Faith
lender.loan_because: We loan because global poverty is an important issue to us, and because microloans are working.

lender.name: E&J Inc
lender.loan_because: "A small body of determined spirits fired by an unquenchable faith in their mission can alter the course of history" - Ghandi
lender.occupational_info: fostering human potential

lender.name: Jarid
lender.loan_because: I "have", so why not?
lender.occupational_info: I am a broadcaster in the U.S. Air Force. I work to improve the morale of servicemmbers stationed around the world.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I have received many blessings and I want to help those who need them

lender.name: Starr
lender.loan_because: This introduction to Kiva was the best Xmas gift I received. Hope the gift certificate helps.

lender.name: James & Vi
lender.loan_because: Whether it be with kindness, sound advice, or a small loan, we can all make a difference. We just have to try. A little help can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info:
James manages and leads a team of engineers deploying and maintaining computer servers for a global pharmaceuticals company.
Vi manages risk for a global engineering company.

lender.name: Cat
lender.loan_because: People need help
lender.occupational_info: Experimental Organic backyard farm on one acre of land. Practicing sustainable living in a residential area.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Building prosperity around the world is building peace.

lender.name: Lucimara & Julia
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people to have the same opportunities that I already have in life.
lender.occupational_info: Special: Love is something to share not something to keep inside of you.

lender.name: Bonny
lender.loan_because: I have always been very fortunate and would like to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I put people to sleep for surgery so that they do not feel pain or remember the surgery.

lender.name: Michele
lender.occupational_info: I assist First Time Buyers purchase thier first home. I help them obtain financial assistance through various Government agencies. This assistance allows them to purchase a home with little to no money out their pocket.

lender.name: keem and mike
lender.loan_because: Everyone wants to be and deserves to be treated with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Keem is a nurse in the ER and works for Hospice of Spokane and I teach students with emotional disorders and learning disabilities.

lender.name: Perry, Maria & Jada
lender.loan_because: I wish to touch someone elses heart. To help them know their not alone in this world. I've been blessed by GOD and wish to share the blessings to others. I understand that all it takes is someone to trust in another to make a difference in this world. There is so much evil and hatred in this world - to bring some love to someone else in this world is not only a blessing for them, but a major blessing for me and my family.
lender.occupational_info: II'm a business onwer myself and here I am today - BLESSED BY THE LORD GOD!

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: there's no greater feeling than helping others. I think everyone is entitled to the same opportunities and resources.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It's a fantastic way to give a bit back to the worldwide community whilst empowering the entrepreneurs involved.
lender.occupational_info: I support schools with their development.

lender.name: Mike & Karen
lender.loan_because: We prefer giving people a helping hand instead of a handout.
lender.occupational_info: Before retiring Mike worked in an oil refinery and Karen worked in a doctor's office.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe everyone who is fortunate should help someone who is less fortunate.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that we must all share what wealth we have with those less fortunate than ourselves

lender.name: Michelle March
lender.loan_because: I believe if we all gave a little what a difference we could make in the lives of those who need it the most!!

lender.name: John and Karen
lender.loan_because: We want all small businesses to have a chance to be successful and grow.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital ensuring all revenue is posted and billed correctly.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe it is our duty as people to assist those in need. We are supposedly a global society now and we have the resources to provide what is needed for the entire world population. We just need the compassion, desire, and means to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise team members in the building whose goal is to make sure the right product gets to the right stores to support sales.

lender.name: Mark and Alice
lender.loan_because: We want to help in any small way we can.

lender.name: Fantasy Bath, Inc
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: We manufacture and sell handmade bath and body products worldwide. We wish you all the success you deserve and hope all of your businesses will thrive.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Changing the world one penny at a time. It can be a better place for not only my children, but everyones.
lender.occupational_info: I run an auto repair garage and a notary service selling licence plates.

lender.name: jackson
lender.loan_because: i loan cause its fun

lender.name: Susan M.
lender.loan_because: I think we all need to give back from what we are given. None of us is separate from anothr and since I'm fortunate to be in the USA with a job and health care - a wealthy person compared to most of the world - I have an obligation to assist others to thrive.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: It's nice to see your loan go directly to people who need it and who are trying to improve their situation in life, in regions of the world that could use plenty of assistance.
lender.occupational_info: Federal employee for the Canadian Government. We are responsible for the clean water, waste water and fueling stations at an army base in Kingston Ontario.

lender.name: vic
lender.loan_because: its a positive way to help people help themselves

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I have enough, its time to share.
lender.occupational_info: Chalenging, rewarding and exciting. Meeting people and see them find their strengths and use them. Set their goals and reach them!

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I want to see the results of my help. I think this is a fantastic idea as it is helping people to better help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in school library.

lender.name: Sylvia & Rick
lender.loan_because: we are grateful for the abundance in our lives; therefore, we would like to help others living in developing countries who do not have the opportunities we americans enjoy.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Just doing my small part...a lot of small parts can make a big difference in someones life.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: I need to help others out of thankfulness
lender.occupational_info: Computer Project Team member & basketball coach

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: it's great to be able to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an eighth grade student at Wayzata Central Middle School. I hope to visit Nicaragua on a mission trip soon.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I lend for several reasons but no matter what the other reasons are we are all one big family on this planet and well family takes care of its own no matter where one lives. This is just one more wonderful way to help family around the world do better for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My job is simple I answer phones, take customer orders on products for a major televised retailer in the United States. Television Sales Customer Service Representative.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: In the US, we are becoming so accustomed to big box businesses that we forget most of the rest of the world operates as one-to-one businesses. I want to support that to the extent I can -- this is one way!
lender.occupational_info: I earn my living as an accountant and manager. I get enjoyment and fulfillment from making bead jewelry by hand. My cat, Riley, helps a lot!

lender.name: John and Jenika
lender.loan_because: We are siblings who want to help as much as possible. We feel that we have so many blessings that we should help others to make a better life for themselves
lender.occupational_info:
John: I wake up at 6:15 in the morning to get ready for marching band where I learn how to play my instrument and get self discipline. Then I learn biology, which is how living things work. Next I learn the language of latin. I learn some math later and then learn some of the history of our planet. Lastly I learn more about my first language of English.
Jenika: I go to college to learn lots of exciting stuff, including English, Logic, Computer Science, and Fencing

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I loan because there is such a need and we have so much.

lender.name: P Family
lender.loan_because: If a family can support themselves, their children can go to school and I believe that education is the key to making the world a safer, better home for all of us. Supporting women's education and financial independence is especially important to me because the mother is the heart of the family and her success will lead her children to a better life. I am also a hobby seamstress, so sewing is one of my favorite Kiva businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Wife's primary job is homemaker, but she also works part-time helping people over the phone while children are in school. Husband is a businessman that works in a large office building. Our children help us choose our Kiva partners. One child is studying medical research at a major university and specializing in the parasites that cause problems in many of the Kiva countries. One child is independent while the other is still in school.

lender.name: Mary Rose
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed enough in this life to be able to lend a hand to those who wish to make a better life for themselves and their families. Many thanks to my family for helping to get this started through their generous Christmas gifts and good luck to all the businesses which will recieve loans from Kiva.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: To help those who want to help themselves & make a difference.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have, and am able to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I run a "dorm" on campus where college students live while they're getting an education.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help others in developing countries improve their standard of living and sense of self-worth.

lender.name: Denny
lender.loan_because: I am very interested in facilitating independent living.
lender.occupational_info: I work with an international relief organization.

lender.name: Jon and Carmen
lender.loan_because: we are the first generation on the planet that can end poverty. Spread the Gratitude.

lender.name: David
lender.occupation: Las Vegas, NV Civil Engineering Consultant
lender.loan_because: I know that one person can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I develop communities for my friends and family to thrive into the future.

lender.name: Dan & Lori
lender.loan_because: This seems a good way to get money to people who really need it. It's nice to put a 'face' to the person you are actually helping.
lender.occupational_info: Dan: maintain communications network. Lori: health care industry.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: "We are each the source of the other's river". - Noah benShea
lender.occupational_info: I lead teams that manage many aerospace development and manufacturing programs.

lender.name: josh
lender.loan_because: I love to help people
lender.occupational_info: I am a kid

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to succeed!!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a world wide pharmaceutical company.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Just want to help people make a difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a teacher. I teach English and history to 13 and 14 year old students.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a special education teacher. I like to say I work with students who are talented in non-traditional ways.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: Making a difference is what life is all about, helping others does wonders for self worth
lender.occupational_info: I help hard working people by processing their pay checks accurately and on time

lender.name: Micah
lender.loan_because: My daddy is helping me to learn about giving.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to please my dad in whatever way I can.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It's good to be able to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a junior studying engineering at the University of Minnesota.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: Helping people is what we should all do.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school where I am learning how to write words and sentences, do math and lots of other cool things.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I think that by KIVA giving women the opportunity to financially support their children by helping them start their own business is a blessing.

lender.name: ellen
lender.loan_because: a little can do a lot.

lender.name: Malinda
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a happy life

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I want to help young mothers provide for their children.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: My son Tim gave me the membership as a Christmas gift and made me aware of Kiva. I'm glad he did!
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired from the communications industry.

lender.name: Deirdre
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I have a business and I've known what it is like to need funding to move to the next step. I love having a positive impact on the livelihood of another!
lender.occupational_info: I have been creating my entire life, from being a designer of clothing to a designer of living spaces to creating and writing daily in my blog.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I am selfish and love to soak up the happiness it returns to me. Knowing I am helping someone in need. Giving is the best feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant for a telecommunications company.

lender.name: Heidi & Dylan
lender.loan_because: We all need each other.

lender.name: Marcos & Lucas
lender.loan_because: We loan because the families that we will loan to don't have all the things that we do. God blessed us so we want to help others.

lender.name: GAMMA Salt
lender.loan_because: We want to help on the making of a better world for future generations. Set an example to our children and Thank God for what we have and for all His blessings.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Because it was a gift that I wish to place and then to never hear from you again.
lender.occupational_info: Industrial, Office building development and brokerage.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: I can. Why not help if you are in a position to - even if the amount is small. Every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: Make and buy components to build custom designed electronics.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: Everyone has a right to pursue their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I am a technology strategist - I help companies find new ways to innovate and to apply emerging technologies

lender.name: Mark and Beth
lender.loan_because: Our families came to the United States generations ago and we are blessed with the life our ancestors allowed us to have in a land so full of opportunity. It is our hope to help others around the world achieve a good, safe and secure life for their descendants in places where opportunity may not be as present as it is here.
lender.occupational_info: Beth is a school nurse and has worked extensively with disabled children. Mark designs businesses to work as a balance of products, processes and resources.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward....
lender.occupational_info: I work for hotels around the world, representing them in the Travel Industry for Corporate, Leisure and Entertainment Annual Volume Accounts and Group business.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: microfinance is a way I can help others to improve things. Having run my own small business, I know that getting a small loan can provide the seed to improve things for other people.
lender.occupational_info: I make and improve software to work better.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I learned about this unique opportunity and think it's a great way to help people around the world in a very direct way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art classes at a community college. I teach Drawing, Painting, Digital Art, Art History and Art Appreciation.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone be a success, who may them help others.
lender.occupational_info: I was a machinist and an inspector before retiring.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: theres always someone in need..

lender.name: Stephany
lender.loan_because: Because I feel joy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Environmental Health Specialist. I inspect restaurants, hotels/motels, pools, and on-site sewage systems.

lender.name: Pat,Sher,Kay,Tay,Afsar
lender.loan_because: it is a socially responsible way to help others improve their situations in life and enable them to be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Father is a geologist, children are students, and mother does volunteer work in the community.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance.

lender.name: CHRISTINA
lender.loan_because: It is a better way to help than a handout.

lender.name: Roch & Daphne
lender.loan_because: I want to use well what I was given.
lender.occupational_info: Through discussions to help others move forward in life.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me a gift certificate for Christmas. It was my favorite present. My degree is in International Relations/Global Studies and it is good to know I can participate with kiva.org to make a good thing happen.
lender.occupational_info: I currently draw and paint and plan to sculpt. I also make jewelry. Recently I have been focusing on writing.

lender.name: Thea
lender.loan_because: it increases justice and peace.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator of children.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I've always liked to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a hotel consultant, sworn translator and Hony. Consul General of Sri Lanka in Madrid, Spain

lender.name: stephen
lender.loan_because: to help, of course

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It gives me immense satisfaction to help people who want to help themselves. Many people are willing to work hard and just need a hand up. I like that the money goes directly to the person I am helping and that I get to give it out over and over again.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a community hospital providing care to those living with cancer.

lender.name: veronica
lender.loan_because: A little goes a long way. My kids participate too.
lender.occupational_info: Lending money, giving hope, inspiring entrepreneurship.

lender.name: The Dahls
lender.occupational_info: High School math teacher

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Helping your "neighbor" is important. Living in America is a wonderful advantage, and helping others is what life is about.
lender.occupational_info: Now retired; before, worked for major USA companies in building consumer products.

lender.name: Tamika
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so that I may be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Tien
lender.occupation: High School Rep for the Art Institutes

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my family with the capacity, and therefore the responsibility, to help others in need. I appreciate the chance to help other parents make a living and better provide for their children.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a homemaker, or "housewife." I take care of our children, our household, a small garden, and several animals.

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: My social conscience tells me to
lender.occupational_info: I research ways to control insects that spread disease

lender.name: Aran & Stacy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Aran is a student at the University of Oregon. Stacy is a land use planner at Lane Council of Governments.

lender.name: Bianca
lender.loan_because: It makes me smile to know that I can help make someone else's dreams become reality by loaning even a small amount.
lender.occupational_info: I make Fitness and Exercise fun, while motivating and showing individuals new ways of strength training and weight training to add new variety to one's workouts. So that they can accomplish any physical goals they have for themselves.

lender.name: Cassel
lender.loan_because: I know that I will be helping someone that will take advantage of this money. and knowing that I will help make this world better.
lender.occupational_info: Doing this I feel great, there is nothing better than help people that need it.

lender.name: 4Weeks
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: I received this Kiva "gift certificate" for a Christmas present and am happy to loan to help someone get a good start!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I've had people help me along the way and I think it's "Good Karma" to help others. So what goes around, comes around, and I guess it's my turn and and an opportunity to do something good.
